definition: inspection copy (of a textbook etc)/trial edition
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: To get top-quality and high-yield paddy, we must try our newly developed pesticides.
sentences.chinese: 要想使水稻高產優質，請試用本廠農藥新產品。

sentences.english: You need some tools to try this tutorial's code.
sentences.chinese: 您需要一些工具才能試用本教程中的代碼。
